instructions: Make sure your phone and Chromecast are connected to the same Wi-Fi network . Open the Google Home app on your phone. Tap the Chromecast you want to mirror your phone to. Tap Cast my screen . Cast Android Screen To Chromecast Steps Cast Android Screen To Chromecast Steps Cast Android Screen To Chromecast Steps Source: Android Central Tap Cast screen . Google will warn you not to show any passwords or other sensitive data while screen recording or casting your screen. Tap Start now to cast your screen to your Chromecast. You can control the volume in the Home app and also tap the Stop mirroring button when you're done.
